subject: Greetings to you and your fa
body:
Greetings to you and your family, I know that my message will come to you as a surprise, Please accept my apology, I am Mrs.Kadi Balla, a widow from Burkina Faso west African, I am sending this brief letter to solicit your partnership to transfer the sum of $7.5 Million Usd, Seven million five hundred thousand United States Dollars. I shall send you more information and procedures when I receive a positive response from you.
Best Regards
Mrs.Kadi BALLA

subject: Re:   Greetings to you and your fa
body:
Dear Balla,

I'm sorry to hear about your situation. However, I need more information before I can assist you. Could you please provide more details about the transaction you're proposing?

Best wishes,
Tom
